div.span:
High standards and strong outcomes in RSU #22 are products of the commitment to the optimal learning of all students by the RSU 22 community!
Learn More about Committed to Learning

Academic achievement and enrichment through co-curricular activities are cornerstones of RSU #22 programs.
Learn More about Excellence in Education

img.alt: ESPN Special Olympics Unified Champion School 2019-2020

div.span: ESPN Special Olympics Unified Champion School 2019-2020

Hampden Academy was the only school in the state and one of just 34 schools in the country that was named as an ESPN Special Olympics Unified Champion School
Learn More about ESPN Special Olympics Unified Champion School 2019-2020

RSU 22's highly regarded music program offers performance and non-performance opportunities for students of all skill levels and of varying musical interests.
Learn More about Music and Performing Arts

One of the few Maine school districts to have a set of K-12 schools together on one campus - walk to any school
Learn More about All-Inclusive Campus

strong.span: Important: parent survey link to collect information about your child's remote learning experience. Please complete the short, anonymous survey. The results will be used to make improvements to RSU 22's remote learning system. Thank you for your participation. ***

div.span: Call today! An RSU 22 staff member will answer your call and address your technology issue. Call with laptop, software, app or any technology needs.

span.strong: Information for you from Riverside Adult Education regarding Covid-19

div.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; text-align: center;
color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;
color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;
color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;
div.span: In an effort to proactively slow the spread of Covid-19, Riverside Adult Ed will be making changes to our calendar. These changes are aligned with our collaborating RSUs' careful decisions about how to best support our community health.

div.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;

h4.style: margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; font-size: 18px; line-height: 22.5px; text-align: left;
h4.span: All enrichment classes will be postponed. We look forward to rescheduling classes as soon as is safely possible.

h4.style: margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; font-size: 18px; line-height: 22.5px; text-align: left;
h4.span: If you wish to cancel your registration for a class not yet begun, we can offer you a credit towards a future class (to be used by Dec 31, 2020) or reimburse your registration fee minus the processing fees.

span.strong: Classes that have already begun will be rescheduled.

div.style: text-align: left;

span.strong: Academic services will continue online. Our Academic teachers are prepared to keep ESL, math, reading, high school diploma, academics advising, and college readiness services running virtually.

span.style: font-family: "times new roman", serif; color: rgb(32, 32, 32);

div.span: The CDC has offered some supportive ideas regarding managing stress and anxiety during this unusual time. Information can be found at https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/prepare/managing-stress-anxiety.html.

div.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;
color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;
div.span: Please reach out with questions about your classes or adult education services. You can reach me at rcross@rsu26.org, or at 866-4119.
